class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3._</span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3.util._</span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3.iotesters.</span><span class='o'>{</span><span input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='生成器和容器'>生成器和容器</h1><p>在本节中，我们将重点介绍<em>生成器（generators）</em>的概念以及怎样用Scala容器来作为实现它们的工具。与其将Chisel代码看作是一个电路的<em>实例（instance）</em>（即特定电路的描述），我们在这里将其视为电路的生成器。</p><p>我们将首先来看看先前练习中的FIR滤波器。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [3]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>b3</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x_n1</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>RegNext</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mf'>0.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x_n2</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>RegNext</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x_n1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mf'>0.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x_n3</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>RegNext</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x_n2</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mf'>0.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>b0</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>8.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>x_n1</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>b1</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>8.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>x_n2</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>b2</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>8.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>x_n3</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>b3</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>(</span><span <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[3]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>My4ElementFir</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>该电路是生成器的一种简单的例子，因为它可以使用不同的参数来生成此4抽头（tap）滤波器的版本：但是，如果我们希望电路具有更多的抽头呢？我们将分几个步骤来进行：</p><ul><li>建立抽头（tap）数目可配置的FIR的软件的<em>黄金模型（Golden Model）</em> 。</li><li>重新设计我们的测试，并确认这个新的模型它可以工作。</li><li>重构我们的My4ElementFir以允许可配置的抽头数量。</li><li>使用我们的新测试约束来测试新电路。</li></ul><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：FIR黄金模型（Golden Model）** </span><br> 以下是用Scala软件实现的FIR电路。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [4]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='cm'>/**</span><span class='cm'> * 带有任意抽头（tap）的FIR滤波器的简单实现。</span><span class='cm'> */</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>ScalaFirFilter</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>taps</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Seq</span><span class='o'>[</span><span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>])</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>pseudoRegisters</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>List</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>fill</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>taps</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>length</span><span class='o'>)(</span><span class='mi'>0</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>value</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>pseudoRegisters</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>value</span> <span class='o'>::</span> <span class='n'>pseudoRegisters</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>take</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>taps</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>length</span> <span class='o'>-</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>accumulator</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='k'>for</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='n'>taps</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>indices</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>accumulator</span> <span class='o'>+=</span> <span class='n'>taps</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>pseudoRegisters</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>accumulator</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[4]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>ScalaFirFilter</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h3 id='Seq'>Seq</h3><p>注意，<code>taps</code>已成为<code>Seq[Int]</code>，这意味着用户在构造该类时可以传递任意长的<code>Int</code>序列。</p><h3 id='寄存器'>寄存器</h3><p>通过<code>var pseudoRegisters = List.fill(taps.length)(0)</code>，我们创建了一个列表<code>List</code>，它将保存前一个时钟周期的值。之所以选择列表<code>List</code>，是因为往其头部添加元素以及从尾部删除最后一个元素的语法非常简单。几乎任何scala容器中的类都可以使用。另外，我们还将此列表初始化为全零。</p><h3 id='Poke'>Poke</h3><p>我们的类添加了一个<code>poke</code>函数/方法，该函数模拟了将新输入放入滤波器并行进一个时钟周期。</p><h3 id='更新寄存器'>更新寄存器</h3><p><code>pseudoRegisters = value :: pseudoRegisters.take(taps.length - 1)</code>这一行首先使用列表的<code>take</code>方法取出列表中除最后一个元素之外的所有元素，然后使用<code>::</code>这个列表的连接运算符将<code>value</code>添加到列表的开头。</p><h3 id='计算输出'>计算输出</h3><p>一个带有累加器的简单for循环将列表中的每个元素乘以其相应的抽头（tap）系数。仅带有<code>accumulator</code>的这一行将返回该值作为函数结果。</p><h2 id='修改我们之前的测试用于这个黄金模型'>修改我们之前的测试用于这个黄金模型</h2><p>现在，我们将使用以前的工作来确认我们的黄金模型有效。进行一些编辑就可以将我们之前的测试方法变形为...</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [5]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>filter</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>ScalaFirFilter</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Seq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>))</span><span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>0</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>filter</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"out = </span><span class='si'>$out</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 1, 0, 0, 0</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>filter</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>4</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>5</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 4, 1, 0, 0</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"out = </span><span class='si'>$out</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>filter</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>3</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>8</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 3, 4, 1, 0</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"out = </span><span class='si'>$out</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>filter</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 2, 3, 4, 1</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"out = </span><span class='si'>$out</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>filter</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>7</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 7, 2, 3, 4</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"out = </span><span class='si'>$out</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>filter</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>0</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>12</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 0, 7, 2, 3</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"out = </span><span class='si'>$out</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>out = 1out = 5out = 8out = 10out = 16out = 12</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='ansi-green-fg'>12</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>执行前面的代码表明，我们的软件模型返回的结果与之前的<code>My4ElementFir</code>相同。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='使用黄金模型（golden-model）来测试电路。'>使用黄金模型（golden model）来测试电路。</h2><p>既然我们对黄金模型有足够的信心，我们就可以重写测试从而将电路输出与黄金模型的输出进行比较，而不必使用费力的手工生成的测试用例。接下来是快速实现的第一步。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div rendered_html'><p>上面的测试运行100个时钟周期，并在每一步检查用两种不同的方法（硬件和软件）得到的结果是否一致。</p><h3 id='注意事项'>注意事项</h3><p>（实际上是我们在撰写本文时实际犯的错误。）</p><ol><li>将<code>step</code>放在正确的位置。软件和硬件的执行方式不同；这很容易弄错。</li><li>此测试很弱，因为它对IO和寄存器的大小非常敏感。用软件来实现任意数据宽度的环绕（wrap）行为非常复杂。在这里，我们确保只传递适合的值。</li></ol></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：参数化FIR生成器**</span><br> 在下面，我们创建了一个新的滤波器的类，即<code>MyManyElementsFilter</code>，该类接受一个常量<code>Seq</code>用于抽头。该列表可以包含任意数量的元素。另外，我们添加了<code>bitWidth</code>，用于控制电路可以处理的数字的大小。</p><p>为了使得长度可变，我们不得不重构寄存器的创建及其连接方式。下面只用了所有容器的方法中的一部分。后面的几节将说明如何更简洁同时也更清晰地表达该行为。</p></div></div></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h4 id='我们是怎么做到的'>我们是怎么做到的</h4><p>从第7、13和18行开始，共有三个并行的部分。我们使用一种名为<code>ArrayBuffer</code>的Scala容器类型。<code>ArrayBuffer</code>允许您使用<code>+=</code>运算符来添加元素（也可以插入和删除，但我们不需要）。首先，我们创建一个<code>ArrayBuffer</code>的<code>regs</code>，其元素将为<code>UInt</code>类型。然后遍历抽头，将输入添加为第一个元素，然后使用<code>RegNext</code>创建寄存器，将该寄存器的输入连接到前一个寄存器（<code>regs(i-1)</code>），并将其初始化为无符号的0（<code>0.U</code>）。这些寄存器用来保留之前输入的值。</p><p>接下来，我们创建另一个<code>UInt</code>类型的另一个<code>ArrayBuffer</code>-<code>muls</code>。<code>muls</code>的每个元素都是一个节点，其第i个元素是<code>regs(i)</code>和 <code>const(i)</code>的乘积。</p><p>注意<code>scan.last</code>方法的使用。它用来获取容器的最后一个元素，是之前构造<code>regs</code>时采用的<code>regs(i - 1)</code>的另一种更优雅的替代方案。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h3 id='它的行为与My4ElementFir相同吗？'>它的行为与<code>My4ElementFir</code>相同吗？</h3><p>新版本的第一个测试是看它是否可以通过我们刚刚应于<code>My4ElementFir</code>的测试。我们创建一个<code>MyManyElementFir</code>的实例，并通过它运行更多数据。</p></div></div></div><div </span><br>下面的代码在FIR生成器的IO里添加了一个额外的<code>consts</code>向量，该向量允许在电路生成后从外部更改参数。这是通过Chisel的容器类型<code>Vec</code>完成的。<code>Vec</code>支持许多Scala容器的方法，但它只能包含Chisel硬件元素。<code>Vec</code>仅应该在普通Scala容器用不了的情况下使用。基本上，这是以下两种情况之一：</p><ol><li>您需要在Bundle（通常是将用作IO的Bundle）中使用容器。</li><li>您需要通过属于硬件的索引来访问容器（例如寄存器组register style='color:red'>**练习：32位RISC-V处理器**</span><br></p><p>是处理器中重要的组成部分。寄存器组是可以通过多个读或写端口读取或写入的寄存器阵列。每个端口都包含一个地址和数据字段。</p><p>定义了多个指令集的变体，其中最简单的变体称为RV32I。RV32I包含一个具有32个32位寄存器的寄存器阵列。<strong>无论您在索引0的位置写了什么，索引0处的寄存器（第一个寄存器）读取值始终为零</strong>（这是为了方便的使用0这个值）。</p><p>这个练习为RV32I实现寄存器组（register file），它具有一个写入端口和若干个读取端口（读取端口的数目是参数）。仅在<code>wen</code>（写使能）被置上时才执行写操作。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='第三章第一节：生成器：参数'>第三章第一节：生成器：参数</h1><h2 id='本节的目的'>本节的目的</h2><p>要使Chisel模块成为代码生成器，必须有一些东西可以告诉生成器应该如何处理它的工作。在本节中，我们将讨论模块的参数化，参数化的各种方法以及Scala语言特性。能够靠参数传递实现的丰富程度与其生成的电路的丰富程度直接相关。参数应提供有用的默认值，易于设置，并防止非法或无意义的值。对于更复杂的系统，如果它们可以在局部被覆盖（override），而不会无意中影响其他模块中的使用，则非常有用。</p><h2 id='设置'>设置</h2></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div id='参数传递'>参数传递</h1><p>Chisel为编写硬件生成器提供了强大的语法。生成器可以接收一些电路参数并生成电路描述的程序。在本节中，我们将首先讨论Chisel生成器如何获取其参数。</p><p><span style =“color：blue”> <strong>示例：参数化的Scala对象</strong> </ span> <br>每个Chisel<code>模块</code>都是Scala类，就像其他任何类一样。回想一下，Scala类可以像这样参数化：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='可选参数和默认参数'>可选参数和默认参数</h1><p>有时函数有时会返回一个值，有时则不会。 Scala在类型系统中提供了一种机制可以处理这样的情况，而不是在无法返回值时发生错误。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：错误的映射（map）索引调用** </span><br>在以下示例中，我们有一个包含多个键/值对的映射。如果我们尝试访问缺少的键/值对，那么我们会得到运行时错误：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [6]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>map</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Map</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"a"</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>a</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>map</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"a"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>a</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>b</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>map</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"b"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>b</span><span class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：获取不确定是否存在的索引**</span><br>但是，<code>Map</code>通过 <strong>get</strong>方法提供了另一种访问键值的方法。它会返回一个抽象类<code>Option</code>的实例。而<code>Option</code>有两个子类，<code>Some</code>和<code>None</code>。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [7]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>a</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>map</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>get</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"a"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>a</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>b</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>map</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>get</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"b"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>b</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='ansi-cyan-fg'>map</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Map</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>String</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>None</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>正如您将在后面的章节中看到的那样，<code>Option</code>非常重要，因为它允许用户使用match语句来检查Scala类型和值。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：Get Or Else！** </span><br>就像<code>Map</code>一样，<code>Option</code>也有一个<code>get</code>方法，如果其为<code>None</code>时调用就会出错。对于这些实例，我们可以使用 <strong><code>getOrElse</code></strong> 为其提供默认值。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [8]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>some</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Some</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>none</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>None</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>some</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>get</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 返回 1</span><span class='c1'>// println(none.get) // 错误!</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>some</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>getOrElse</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='c1'>// 返回 1</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>none</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>getOrElse</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='c1'>// 返回 2</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>112</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[8]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>some</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Some</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>Some</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>none</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>None</span>.type = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>None</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='默认参数中使用Option'>默认参数中使用Option</h2><p>当对象或函数具有大量参数时，如果每次都需要指定全部参数可能会非常繁琐且容易出错。在第一章中，您已经了解了命名参数和参数默认值。有时，参数并没有良好的默认值。在这样的情况下，<code>Option</code>可以使用默认值<code>None</code>。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：可选重置** </span><br>以下的代码将输入延迟一个时钟周期。如果<code>resetValue = None</code>（这是默认值），寄存器将没有复位值并被初始化为垃圾。这避免了使用正常范围之外的值来表示“无”这样的情况，例如使用-1作为复位值来表示该寄存器未被重置。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [9]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>DelayBy1</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>resetValue</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Option</span><span class='o'>[</span><span class='kt'>UInt</span><span class='o'>]</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>None</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(</span> <span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>16.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>16.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>reg</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>resetValue</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>isDefined</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// resetValue = Some(number)</span> <span class='nc'>RegInit</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>resetValue</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>get</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='k'>else</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>//resetValue = None</span> <span class='nc'>Reg</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>())</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>reg</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>reg</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getVerilog</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>DelayBy1</span><span class='o'>))</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getVerilog</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>DelayBy1</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Some</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>3.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>))))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div output_prompt'>Out[9]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>DelayBy1</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='Match/Case-语句'>Match/Case 语句</h1><p>在Scala中，<em>match</em>的概念被用在整个Chisel的设计中，这是每个Chisel程序员必须理解的一部分。 Scala提供match运算符，它支持：</p><ul><li>对几个可能性进行简单测试，类似C语言的<em>switch</em>语句</li><li>对特定值的组合的复杂测试</li><li>当变量的类型未知或未指定时，根据变量的类型执行操作，例如：<ul><li>变量来自列表<code>val mixedList = List(1, 'string', false)</code></li><li>或者已知变量是超类的实例，但不知道它是哪个特定的子类。</li></ul></li><li>提取用<em>正则表达式</em>指定的字符串的子字符串</li></ul><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：值匹配** </span><br>下面的例子，根据我们<strong>匹配</strong>的变量的<strong>值</strong>，我们执行不同的<strong>case</strong>语句：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [10]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// y 是在代码中其他地方定义的整数变量</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>7</span><span class='c1'>/// ...</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='k'>match</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='s'>"zero"</span> <span class='c1'>// 常见的语法，如果一行代码能放下的话，优先使用这种语法</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='mi'>1</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='c1'>// 另一种常见的语法，如果一行放不下的话使用</span> <span class='s'>"one"</span> <span class='c1'>// 注意：代码块一直到下一个 case 语句为止</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='mi'>2</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// 另一种语法， 但是大括号不是必需的</span> <span class='s'>"two"</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='k'>_</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='s'>"many"</span> <span class='c1'>// _ 是可以匹配任何值的通配符|</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"y is "</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>y is many</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[10]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>y</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>7</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>x</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>String</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>"many"</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>上面的代码中，match操作符为每个case检查可能的值，并返回一个字符串。有几点需要注意：</p><ul><li>在<code>=></code>运算符后面的每个代码块一直持续到它遇到match结束的大括号或下一个case语句为止。</li><li>按case语句的顺序进行匹配，一旦匹配了某个case语句，就结束了</li><li>使用下划线作为通配符，以处理未匹配的其他值。</li></ul><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：多值匹配** </span><br>此外，还可以同时匹配多个变量。这是一个使用匹配语句实现的真值表（truth table）的简单示例：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [11]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>animalType</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>biggerThanBreadBox</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>meanAsCanBe</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>String</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>biggerThanBreadBox</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>meanAsCanBe</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>match</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='s'>"wolverine"</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='s'>"elephant"</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='s'>"shrew"</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='s'>"puppy"</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>animalType</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>wolverine</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[11]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>animalType</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：类型匹配** </span><br>Scala是一种强类型语言，因此所有对象的类型在运行时都是已知的。我们可以使用<strong>match语句</strong>来使用此类型信息：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [12]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>sequence</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Seq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"a"</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mf'>0.0</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>sequence</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>foreach</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>match</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='n'>s</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>String</span> <span class='o'>=></span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"</span><span class='si'>$x</span><span class='s'> is a String"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='n'>s</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=></span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"</span><span class='si'>$x</span><span class='s'> is an Int"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='n'>s</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Double</span> <span class='o'>=></span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"</span><span class='si'>$x</span><span class='s'> is a Double"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='k'>_</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"</span><span class='si'>$x</span><span class='s'> is an unknown type!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>a is a String1 is an Int0.0 is a Double</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[12]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>sequence</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Seq</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Any</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>"a"</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>0.0</span>)</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：多种类型匹配** </span><br>如果要匹配一个值是否具有多种类型中的某一个，请使用以下语法。 <em>请注意，匹配时<strong>必须</strong>使用<code>_</code>。</em></p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [13]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>sequence</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Seq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"a"</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mf'>0.0</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>sequence</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>foreach</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>match</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='k'>_:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='kt'>|</span> <span class='k'>_</span><span class='kt'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Double</span> <span class='o'>=></span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"</span><span class='si'>$x</span><span class='s'> is a number!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 是否整型或双精度</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='k'>_</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"</span><span class='si'>$x</span><span class='s'> is an unknown type!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>a is an unknown type!1 is a number!0.0 is a number!</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[13]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>sequence</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Seq</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Any</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>"a"</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>0.0</span>)</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：类型匹配和类型擦除（Erasure）** </span><br>类型匹配有一些限制。因为Scala在JVM上运行，并且JVM不维护多态类型，所以在运行时无法匹配它们（因为它们都被擦除）。请注意，以下示例始终与第一个case语句匹配，因为<code>[String]</code>，<code>[Int]</code>和<code>[Double]</code>的多态类型都被擦除掉了，所以case语句<strong>实际上</strong>仅仅匹配了一个<code>Seq</code>。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [14]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='带有可选字段的输入输出'>带有可选字段的输入输出</h1><p>有时我们希望包含或不包含某些IO。也许有一些内部状态能够用来在调试中查看，但是你希望在生成整个系统的时候隐藏它。也许你的生成器有一些输入，不需要在每种情况下都连接，因为它已经具有了一个合理的默认值。</p><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：使用Option的可选IO** </span><br>Bundle中的可选字段是实现此功能的一种方法。在下面的示例中，我们展示了一位可选择接收进位的一位加法器。如果包含进位，<code>io.carryIn</code>将具有类型<code>Some [UInt]</code>并包含在IO bundle中。如果不包含进位，则<code>io.carryIn</code>将具有类型<code>None</code>并将从IO包中排除。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [16]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>HalfFullAdder</span><span input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='Implicits'>Implicits</h1><p>通常，您需要编程时需要大量的不重要但是又没它不行的代码。为了处理这种情况，Scala引入了<strong>implicits</strong>的概念，它允许编译器为你做一些语法糖（syntactic sugar，对语言的功能没有影响，但是更方便程序员使用的语法）。因为很多事情都发生在幕后，所以implicits可能看起来非常神奇。本节分解了一些基本示例，以解释它们的含义以及它们的常用用法。</p><h2 id='隐含参数'>隐含参数</h2><p>有时，您的代码需要从很深的一系列函数调用中访问某个顶层变量。您可以使用隐式参数为您执行此操作，而不是在每个函数调用时手动传递此变量。</p><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：隐式传递的猫** </span><br>在以下示例中，我们可以隐式或显式地传递cat的数量。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [18]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>object</span> <span class='nc'>CatDog</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>implicit</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>numberOfCats</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='mi'>3</span> <span class='c1'>//implicit val numberOfDogs: Int = 5</span> <span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>tooManyCats</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>nDogs</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)(</span><span class='k'>implicit</span> <span class='n'>nCats</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='n'>nCats</span> <span class='o'>></span> <span class='n'>nDogs</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>imp</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>tooManyCats</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 参数被隐式传递!</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>exp</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>tooManyCats</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 参数被显式传递!</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='nc'>CatDog</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>imp</span><span class='nc'>CatDog</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>exp</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[18]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>object</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>CatDog</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res17_1</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Boolean</span> = true<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res17_2</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Boolean</span> = false</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>上面发生了什么事？首先，我们定义一个隐含值<strong>numberOfCats</strong>。在一个给定作用域内，<strong>一个给定类型只能有一个的隐含值</strong>。然后，我们定义了一个带有两个参数的函数;第一个是显式参数，第二个是隐式参数。当我们调用<strong>tooManyCats</strong>时，我们要么省略第二个隐式参数（让编译器为我们找到它），要么为它显式提供一个值（可以与隐含值不同）。</p><p>以下是隐含参数会<em>失败</em>的情况：</p><ul><li>在作用域中定义了给定类型的两个或多个隐含值</li><li>编译器找不到函数调用所需的隐含值</li></ul><p><span style='color:blue'> **示例：隐式日志** </span><br>下面代码块展示了如何使用隐含参数在Chisel生成器中实现日志（log）功能。</p><p><strong><em>注意：Scala中有更好的写日志的方法！</em></strong></p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [19]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span id='隐式转换'>隐式转换</h2><p>与隐含参数一样，隐式函数（也称为<strong>隐式转换</strong>）用于减少那些不重要但是又没它不行的代码。更具体地说，它们用于自动将一个Scala对象转换为另一个。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**示例：隐式转换**</span><br>在下面的例子中，我们有两个类，<code>Animal</code>和<code>Human</code>。 <code>Animal</code>有一个<code>species</code>字段，但<code>Human</code>没有。但是，通过实现隐式转换，我们可以在<code>Human</code>上调用<code>species</code>。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='第二章第六节：Testers2'>第二章第六节：Testers2</h1><h2 id='本节的目的'>本节的目的</h2><p>Chisel团队一直在改进测试框架，新的测试框架我们称为“Testers2”，它提供了以下改进：</p><ul><li>适用于单元测试和系统集成测试</li><li>设计考虑了可组合的抽象和分层</li><li>高度可用，尽可能使得单元测试简单，方便（避免不重要，但是又没它不行的代码），并有用</li></ul><h3 id='计划中的特性'>计划中的特性</h3><ul><li>适用于多个后端和仿真器（如果测试向量不是静态的可能需要链接到Scala，或者综合到FPGA时使用一定的构建测试的API）</li><li>将包含在基本的chisel3中，以避免额外的包和其他的依赖关系</li></ul><h2 id='设置'>设置</h2></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight id='基本测试的实现'>基本测试的实现</h1><p>Testers2与iotester的基本操作相同。下面是基本功能的简要总结，对比旧的iotesters和新的testers2：</p><table><thead><tr><th style='text-align:left'>操作</th><th style='text-align:left'>iotesters</th><th style='text-align:left'>testers2</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style='text-align:left'>poke</td><td style='text-align:left'>poke(c.io.in1, 6)</td><td style='text-align:left'>c.io.in1.poke(6.U)</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>peek</td><td style='text-align:left'>peek(c.io.out1)</td><td style='text-align:left'>c.io.out1.peek(6.U)</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>expect</td><td style='text-align:left'>expect(c.io.out1, 6)</td><td style='text-align:left'>c.io.out1.expect(6.U)</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>step</td><td style='text-align:left'>step(1)</td><td style='text-align:left'>c.io.clock.step(1)</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>initiate</td><td style='text-align:left'>Driver.execute(...) { c =></td><td style='text-align:left'>test(...) { c =></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div></div><div class='cell class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>step</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 前进一个时钟周期</span> <span id='上面的例子中需要注意什么'>上面的例子中需要注意什么</h2><p>Testers2测试方法去掉了一些不重要，但是又没它不行的代码。这在旧的<code>PeekPokeTester</code>中是做不到的。</p><p><code>poke</code>和<code>expect</code>方法现在是每个<code>io</code>元素的一部分。这可以让测试更好地检查类型。<code>peek</code>和<code>step</code>方法现在也是<code>io</code>元素的方法了。</p><p>另一个区别是值<code>poked</code>和<code>expected</code>现在是Chisel的字面值（literal）了。虽然这里的例子非常简单，但它为更高级和有趣的例子提供了更强大的检查。接下来的改进将支持指定<code>Bundle</code>字面值（literal），使得这个能力将进一步增强。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='带有Decoupled接口的模块'>带有<code>Decoupled</code>接口的模块</h1><p>在本节中，我们将介绍一些用于处理<code>Decoupled</code>接口的tester2工具。<code>Decoupled</code>可以将基本的chisel数据类型包装起来，并为其提供<code>ready</code>和<code>valid</code>信号。Testers2提供了一些很好的工具，可以自动并可靠地测试这些接口。</p><h2 id='队列示例'>队列示例</h2><p>下面的<code>QueueModule</code>传递类型为<code>ioType</code>的数据。 <code>QueueModule</code>的大小为<code>entries</code>个元素，这是它在报告backpressure之前可以保存的元素的数目。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [6]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>case</span> <span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>QueueModule</span><span class='o'>[</span><span class='kt'>T</span> <span class='k'><:</span> <span class='kt'>Data</span><span class='o'>](</span><span class='n'>ioType</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>T</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>entries</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>MultiIOModule</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Flipped</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Decoupled</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>ioType</span><span class='o'>)))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Decoupled</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>ioType</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'><></span> <span class='nc'>Queue</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>entries</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='EnqueueNow-和-expectDequeueNow'>EnqueueNow 和 expectDequeueNow</h2><p><em>testers2</em>有一些内置的方法来处理IO中具有<code>Decoupled</code>接口的电路。在这个例子中，我们将看到如何从<code>queue</code>中插入和提取值。</p><table><thead><tr><th style='text-align:left'>方法</th><th style='text-align:left'>描述</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style='text-align:left'>enqueueNow</td><td style='text-align:left'>往<code>Decoupled</code>输入接口中添加一个元素 (入队)</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>expectDequeueNow</td><td style='text-align:left'>从<code>Decoupled</code>输出接口中移除一个元素（出列）</td></tr></tbody></table><hr><blockquote><p>注意：有一些必要的但不重要的代码，如<code>initSource</code>，<code>setSourceClock</code>等，这是为了确保<code>ready</code>和<code>valid</code>在测试开始时都被正确初始化。</p></blockquote></div></div></div><div class='n'>setSourceClock</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='EnqueueSeq-和-DequeueSeq'>EnqueueSeq 和 DequeueSeq</h2><p>Now we are going to introduce two new methods that deal with enqueuing and dequeuing operations in single operations.</p><p>现在我们将介绍两种新方法，用于处理单个操作中的入队和出列操作。</p><table><thead><tr><th style='text-align:left'>方法</th><th style='text-align:left'>描述</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style='text-align:left'>enqueueSeq</td><td style='text-align:left'>陆续将<code>Seq</code>中的元素依次添加（入队）到<code>Decoupled</code>输入接口中，一次一个，直到序列耗尽</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>expectDequeueSeq</td><td style='text-align:left'>依次从一个<code>Decoupled</code>输出接口中移除（出列）元素，一次一个，并将每个元素与<code>Seq</code>中元素依次进行比较</td></tr></tbody></table><hr><blockquote><p>注意：下面的例子工作正常但是，如上所述，<code>enqueueSeq</code>必须在<code>expectDequeueSeq</code>开始之前完成。如果<code>testVector</code>的大小大于队列的深度，那么测试会失败，因为队列将被填满并且无法完成入队操作<code>enqueueSeq</code>。建议您改一下代码来看看测试如何会失败。在下一节中，我们将展示如何正确地构建此类测试。</p></blockquote></div></div></div><div class='mf'>9.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>),</span> <span class='n'>entries</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>200</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>c</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='c1'>// 示例测试了队列 Queue 的用法和行为</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>initSource</span><span class='o'>()</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>setSourceClock</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>enqueueSeq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>testVector</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>expectDequeueSeq</span><span class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='testers2中的Fork和Join'>testers2中的Fork和Join</h1></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>在这一小节中，我们将看到如何在单元测试中并发地执行代码。为此，我们将介绍testers22的两个新功能：</p><table><thead><tr><th style='text-align:left'>方法</th><th style='text-align:left'>描述</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style='text-align:left'>fork</td><td style='text-align:left'>启动一个并发代码块，可以通过在前一个fork的代码块末尾附加.fork来并发执行另外的fork代码块</td></tr><tr><td style='text-align:left'>join</td><td style='text-align:left'>将多个fork的分叉重新整合并返回调用线程</td></tr></tbody></table><hr><p>在下面的例子中，有两个连在一起的<code>fork</code>，在最后被<code>join</code>起来。在第一个<code>fork</code>块中，<code>enqueueSeq</code>将依次添加元素直到耗尽。每当数据可用时，第二个<code>fork</code>块将调用<code>expectDequeueSeq</code>在每个时钟周期检查输出。</p><blockquote><p>fork创建的线程以确定的顺序运行，主要根据代码中指定的顺序运行，并且运行时检查禁止某些依赖于其他线程的易受错误的操作。</p></blockquote></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [9]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>test</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>QueueModule</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>9.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>),</span> <span class='n'>entries</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>200</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>c</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='c1'>// 示例测试了队列 Queue 的用法和行为</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>initSource</span><span class='o'>()</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>setSourceClock</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>initSink</span><span class='o'>()</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>setSinkClock</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>testVector</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Seq</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>tabulate</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>300</span><span class='o'>){</span> <span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>i</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>fork</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>enqueueSeq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>testVector</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}.</span><span class='n'>fork</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>expectDequeueSeq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>testVector</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}.</span><span class='n'>join</span><span class='o'>()</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div id='在GCD模块中使用Fork和Join'>在GCD模块中使用Fork和Join</h2><p>在本节中，我们将使用fork join方法来实现<em>最大公约数</em> <strong>GCD</strong>的测试。让我们从定义IO的bundle开始。我们将在这里添加一些必要但不重要的代码，以允许我们使用<code>Bundle</code> <em>字面值（literal）</em>。正如注释所说，希望我们很快能支持自动生成这些代码。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [10]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>GcdInputBundle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>w</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>w</span><span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>GcdInputBundle</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [11]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>UInt</span><span border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>现在让我们来看看<em>Decoupled</em>版本的<strong>GCD</strong> 。我们在这里修改了一些地方，使用<code>Decoupled</code>来包装输入输出，在输入和输出<code>Bundle</code>中添加<code>ready</code>和<code>valid</code>信号。 <code>Flipped</code>用来包装<code>Decoupled</code>接口<code>GcdInputBundle</code>，<code>GcdInputBundle</code>在默认情况下被创建为输出，这里将每个字段的方向（递归地）转换为相反的方向。 <code>Decoupled</code>接口中的数据元素可以通过顶层的字段<code>bits</code>来访问。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [12]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='cm'>/**</span><span class='cm'> * 使用减法来计算GCD。</span><span class='cm'> * 从寄存器 x 和 y 中较大一个中减去较小的一个，直到寄存器 y 为零。</span><span class='cm'> * 输入寄存器 x 的值就是最大公约数</span><span class='cm'> * 返回包含两个输入值及其GCD的包</span><span class='cm'> */</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>DecoupledGcd</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>width</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>MultiIOModule</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>input</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Flipped</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Decoupled</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>GcdInputBundle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>width</span><span class='o'>))))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>output</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Decoupled</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>GcdOutputBundle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>width</span><span class='o'>)))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>xInitial</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Reg</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>())</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>yInitial</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Reg</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>())</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Reg</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>())</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Reg</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>())</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>busy</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>RegInit</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>B</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>resultValid</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>RegInit</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>B</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>input</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>ready</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='o'>!</span> <span class='n'>busy</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>valid</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>resultValid</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>bits</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='nc'>DontCare</span> <span class='n'>when</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>busy</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// 在计算期间，从每次较大的值中减去较小的值</span> <span class='n'>when</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>></span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>-</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>}.</span><span class='n'>otherwise</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>-</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>when</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>===</span> <span class='mf'>0.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// 当 y 变为零时，计算结束，将输出置为 valid</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>bits</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>gcd</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>bits</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>xInitial</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>bits</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value2</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>yInitial</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>bits</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>gcd</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>valid</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>B</span> <span class='n'>busy</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>B</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='o'>}.</span><span class='n'>otherwise</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>when</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>input</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>valid</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// 当有可用的有效数据且没有进行计算时，获取新值并开始计算</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>bundle</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>input</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>deq</span><span class='o'>()</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>bundle</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>bundle</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value2</span> <span class='n'>xInitial</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>bundle</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='n'>yInitial</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>bundle</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value2</span> <span class='n'>busy</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>DecoupledGcd</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>我们的测试与之前的Queue测试看起来非常相似。但是还包含更多事情，因为GCD计算需要多个时钟周期，因此在计算每个GCD时会阻塞住输入的入队。好消息是，在不同的Decoupled电路中，测试简单且一致。</p><p>这里还介绍了新的Chisel3 <code>Bundle</code>字面值（literal）。考虑一下这行代码：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>GcdInputBundle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>)).</span><span class='nc'>Lit</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value2</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div><p>上面定义的<code>GcdInputBundle</code>有两个字段<code>value1</code>和<code>value2</code>。我们首先创建一个bundle然后调用它的<code>.Lit</code>方法来创建一个bundle的字面值（literal）。该方法的输入是一对对的键/值的可变参数列表，其中键（例如 <code>_.value</code>）是字段名称，值（例如 x.U）是chisel的硬件字面值（literal），Scala的<code>Int</code> x被转换为Chisel的<code>UInt</code>字面值（literal）。字段名称前面的 <code>_.</code> 是必须的。</p><blockquote><p>这可能不是最完美方式，但在广泛的讨论中，它被视为在最小化必要但不重要的代码与Scala中可用的符号限制之间取得的最佳平衡。</p></blockquote></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [13]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>test</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>dut</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>input</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>initSource</span><span class='o'>().</span><span class='n'>setSourceClock</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>dut</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>dut</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>initSink</span><span class='o'>().</span><span class='n'>setSinkClock</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>dut</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>clock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>testValues</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>1</span> <span class='n'>to</span> <span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>;</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>1</span> <span class='n'>to</span> <span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>}</span> <span class='k'>yield</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>inputSeq</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>testValues</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>map</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>GcdInputBundle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>)).</span><span class='nc'>Lit</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value2</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>resultSeq</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>testValues</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>map</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>case</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>GcdOutputBundle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>).</span><span class='nc'>Lit</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value1</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>value2</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='k'>_</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>gcd</span> <span class='o'>-></span> <span class='nc'>BigInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>).</span><span class='n'>gcd</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>BigInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>y</span><span class='o'>)).</span><span class='n'>U</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>fork</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>dut</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>input</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>enqueueSeq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>inputSeq</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}.</span><span class='n'>fork</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>dut</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>output</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>expectDequeueSeq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>resultSeq</span><span border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='第二章第五节：结合前面所学的练习：一个有限脉冲响应（FIR）滤波器（Filter）'>第二章第五节：结合前面所学的练习：一个有限脉冲响应（FIR）滤波器（Filter）</h1><h2 id='本节的目的'>本节的目的</h2><p>现在您已经学习了Chisel的基础知识，那么让我们利用这些知识来构建一个FIR（有限脉冲响应）滤波器模块！ FIR滤波器在数字信号处理中非常常见。此外，FIR滤波器将在第三章中频繁出现，因此最好不要跳过这一节！如果您不熟悉FIR滤波器，请访问来了解更多信息。</p><h2 id='设置'>设置</h2></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='ansi-cyan-fg'>chisel3._</span><span class='ansi-green-fg'>import </span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>chisel3.util._</span><span class='ansi-green-fg'>import </span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>chisel3.iotesters.{ChiselFlatSpec, Driver, PeekPokeTester}</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='FIR滤波器'>FIR滤波器</h1><p>您将要设计的这个FIR滤波器包含如下操作：</p><p><img src='images/fir.jpg' width='720'></p><p>基本上，这将滤波器系数与输入信号的每个元素分别相乘，并输出相加之后的总和（也称为 <em>卷积</em>）。</p><p>或者，用信号来定义：</p><p>$y[n] = b_0 x[n] + b_1 x[n-1] + b_2 x[n-2] + ...$</p><ul><li>$y[n]$ 是在时间 $n$ 的输出信号</li><li>$x[n]$ 是输入信号</li><li>$b_i$ 是滤波器系数或脉冲响应</li><li>$n-1$, $n-2$, ... 表示在时间 $n$ 分别被延迟 1, 2, ... 个时钟周期的下标</li></ul><h2 id='规格说明'>规格说明</h2><p>构建一个4元FIR滤波器，其中四个滤波器的系数作为参数。我们为您提供模块代码的框架和基本测试。请注意，输入和输出都是8位无符号整数。您需要使用类似移位寄存器的结构来保存必要的状态（如延迟的信号值）。并使用下面提供的测试来检查您的实现。具有常量输入的寄存器可以使用移位值为1的<code>ShiftRegister</code>来创建或使用<code>RegNext</code>。</p><p>注意：要通过测试的话，寄存器初始值必须为<code>0.U</code>。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>My4ElementFir</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>b0</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>b1</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>b2</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>b3</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>8.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='o'>???</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div b0.U(8.W) + x_n1 \* b1.U(8.W) + x_n2 \* b2.U(8.W) + x_n3 \* b3.U(8.W)</pre></article></div></section></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='FIR滤波器的生成器'>FIR滤波器的生成器</h1><p>在这一节中，我们将使用[本教程 3.2一节：生成器：容器（Collection）]中的示例稍加修改。如果您尚未启动学习3.2节，请不要担心。您将了解<code>MyManyDynamicElementVecFir</code>如何工作的详细信息，但基本思想是FIR滤波器的生成器。</p><p>生成器有一个参数：长度（length)。该参数指定滤波器具有多少个抽头（tap），并且抽头（tap）是硬件模块<code>Module</code>的输入。</p><p>该生成器有3个输入：</p><ul><li>in，滤波器的输入值</li><li>valid，一个布尔值，表示当前输入是否有效</li><li>consts，所有抽头（tap）的向量</li></ul><p>和1输出：</p><ul><li>out，滤波器的输出</li></ul><p><img src='images/fir.jpg' style='width:450px;'/></p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [7]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>MyManyDynamicElementVecFir</span><span border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='DspBlock'>DspBlock</h1><p>将DSP组件集成到更大的系统中可能是一个有挑战性的工作并且容易出错。 包含有用的生成器来帮助完成这些任务。</p><p>其中一个核心抽象是<code>DspBlock</code>。<code>DspBlock</code>具有：</p><ul><li>AXI-4流的输入和输出</li><li>具有内存映射的状态和控制信号（在本例中为AXI4）</li></ul><p><img src='images/fir_filter.png' style='width:800px;'/></p><p><code>DspBlock</code>使用来自rocket的diplomacy接口。 对diplomacy有基本的介绍，但是现在不需要过于担心这个例子是如何工作的。当您需要将许多不同的模块连在一起形成一个复杂的SoC时，diplomacy真的很出彩。在这个例子中，我们只制作一个外设。当diplomacy接口和<code>StandaloneBlock</code>特征（traits）合在一起使用的时候，可以使这个diplomacy接口成为顶层IO接口。只有当<code>DspBlock</code>被用作顶层接口而没有任何其他diplomacy连接时，您才需要它们。</p><p>下面的代码将FIR滤波器包装在AXI4接口中。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [11]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='测试'>测试</h2><p>测试 <code>DspBlock</code> 会稍微有点不同。现在我们需要处理内存接口和<code>LazyModule</code>。dsptools有一些功能可以帮助用来测试<code>DspBlock</code>。</p><p>一个重要的功能是<code>MemMasterModel</code>。该特征（trait）定义了诸如<code>memReadWord</code>和<code>memWriteWord</code>的函数 - 用于生成内存流量的泛型函数。这允许您编写一个可以为特定内存接口特化的通用测试 - 例如，您编写一个通用测试，然后为TileLink和AXI4接口特化它。</p><p>下面的代码以这种方式测试<code>FIRBlock</code>：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [12]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nc'>FIRBlockTester</span><span class='o'>[</span><span class='kt'>D</span>, <span class='kt'>U</span>, <span class='kt'>EO</span>, <span class='kt'>EI</span>, <span class='kt'>B</span> <span class='k'><:</span> <span class='kt'>Data</span><span class='o'>](</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>FIRBlock</span><span class='o'>[</span><span class='kt'>D</span>, <span class='kt'>U</span>, <span class='kt'>EO</span>, <span class='kt'>EI</span>, <span class='kt'>B</span><span class='o'>])</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>PeekPokeTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>module</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>with</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>0</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nFilters</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 将所有的抽头（tap）设置为 1</span> <span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='n'>until</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nFilters</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nTaps</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>memWriteWord</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>8</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>i</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='mi'>8</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='c1'>// 为 AXI4 特化我们的测试</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>AXI4FIRBlockTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>AXI4FIRBlock</span> <span class='kt'>with</span> <span class='kt'>AXI4StandaloneBlock</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>FIRBlockTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>with</span> <span class='nc'>AXI4MasterModel</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>memAXI</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>ioMem</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>get</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='c1'>// 在 lazymodule 上调用我们的测试看上去会有一点奇怪 </span><span class='c1'>// 注意，firblocktester 需要一个 lazymodule 作为参数，而不是一个 module (例如在 "extends PeekPokeTester()" 中调用的).</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span
