id='accordion'><div><input type='checkbox' id='check-2' /><label for='check-2'><strong>答案</strong></label><article><pre style='background-color:#f7f7f7'> io.fifo_ready := io.pe0_ready || io.pe1_ready io.pe0_valid := io.fifo_valid && io.pe0_ready io.pe1_valid := io.fifo_valid && io.pe1_ready && !io.pe0_ready io.pe0_data := io.fifo_data io.pe1_data := io.fifo_data</pre></article></div></section></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:red'>**练习：参数化加法器（可选练习）**</span><br>这个可选的练习目的是让您了解Chisel最强大的功能之一，它的参数化功能。为了暂时这个功能，我们将构造一个参数化的加法器，它可以在发生溢出时将结果饱和处理（saturate），或截断（truncate，wrap around）。</p><p>首先，看看下面的<code>Module</code>。我们将它的参数称为<code>saturate</code>，类型为<em>Scala</em>的<code>Boolean</code>。注意这不是Chisel的<code>Bool</code>类型，所以我们不会创建出一个即包含saturate又包含truncate的硬件加法器，而是创建一个<em>生成器</em>，它可以生成saturate的加法器<em>或者</em>truncate的加法器。这个决定是在编译时做出的。</p><p>接下来，注意输入和输出都是4比特的<code>UInt</code>类型。Chisel可以自动推断所需要的比特的宽度，如果您参考的话，您可以看到普通加法的结果的宽度就等于两个输入中最宽的那个。这意味下面的代码：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>sum</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_a</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_b</span></pre></div><p>会得到一个4比特宽的<code>sum</code>的线（wire），而它的值是被截断（truncate）的。如果需要检查加法的结果是否饱和的话，您需要一个5比特的线。这可以通过 <code>+&</code>操作得到。</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>sum</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_a</span> <span class='o'>+&</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_b</span></pre></div><p>Finally, note that connecting a 4-bit <code>UInt</code> wire to a 5-bit <code>UInt</code> wire will truncate the MSB by default. You can use this to easily truncate the 5-bit sum for the non-saturating adder.最后，注意，将4比特的<code>UInt</code>线连接到5比特的<code>UInt</code>的线上，默认会将高位截断。您可以用这一特性来轻松实现这个加法器中的截断功能。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>ParameterizedAdder</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>saturate</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in_a</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in_b</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='o'>???</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>ParameterizedAdderTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>ParameterizedAdder</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>saturate</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>PeekPokeTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// 100 random tests</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>cycles</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>100</span> <span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>scala.util.Random</span> <span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>scala.math.min</span> <span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='n'>until</span> <span class='n'>cycles</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in_a</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Random</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nextInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in_b</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Random</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nextInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_a</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>in_a</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_b</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>in_b</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>saturate</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>min</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>in_a</span><span class='o'>+</span><span class='n'>in_b</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>15</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='k'>else</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>in_a</span><span class='o'>+</span><span class='n'>in_b</span><span class='o'>)%</span><span class='mi'>16</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='c1'>// ensure we test saturation vs. truncation</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_a</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>15</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in_b</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>15</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>saturate</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>15</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='k'>else</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>14</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>saturate</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='nc'>Seq</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>Driver</span><span class='o'>(()</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>ParameterizedAdder</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>saturate</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>{</span><span class='n'>c</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>ParameterizedAdderTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>saturate</span><span class='o'>)})</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"SUCCESS!!"</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><div id='container'><section id='accordion'><div><input type='checkbox' id='check-3' /><label for='check-3'><strong>答案</strong></label><article><pre style='background-color:#f7f7f7'> val sum = io.in_a +& io.in_b if (saturate) { io.out := Mux(sum > 15.U, 15.U, sum) } else { io.out := sum }</pre></article></div></section></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt entry.title: Chisel教程 2.1：您的第一个Chisel模块

Elsewhere // we use CSS to left justify single line equations in code cells. displayAlign: 'center', 'HTML-CSS': { styles: {'.MathJax_Display': {'margin': 0}}, linebreaks: { automatic: true } } }); </script> <!-- End of mathjax configuration --></head><body> <div tabindex='-1' id='notebook' class='border-box-sizing'> <div class='container' id='notebook-container'><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='第二章第一节：您的第一个Chisel模块'>第二章第一节：您的第一个Chisel模块</h1><h2 id='本节的目的'>本节的目的</h2><p>通过上一章的学习，您应该对Scala已经有所了解，我们可以开始来看看怎么来实现硬件。Chisel的全称是嵌入在Scala中的硬件构造语言（<strong>C</strong>onstructing <strong>H</strong>ardware <strong>I</strong>n a <strong>S</strong>cala <strong>E</strong>mbedded <strong>L</strong>anguage）。这意味着它是Scala中的领域专用语言（DSL），允许您在同一代码中同时利用Scala和Chisel编程。理解哪些代码是“Scala”，哪些代码是“Chisel”非常重要，我们将在稍后讨论这一点。在这一节中我们只需要将Chisel看作是实现Verilog的更好的方法就可以。这一节中我们会看到一个完整的Chisel模块和它的测试，我们现在只需要大致掌握一些要点，之后将会看到更多的例子。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='设置'>设置</h2><p>下面的代码会下载Chisel所依赖的库，你会在之后所有的笔记本中看到它。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>path</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>System</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>getProperty</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"user.dir"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='s'>"/source/load-ivy.sc"</span><span class='n'>interp</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>load</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>module</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>ammonite</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>ops</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>Path</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>java</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nio</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>file</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>FileSystems</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>getDefault</span><span class='o'>().</span><span class='n'>getPath</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>path</span><span class='o'>)))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>如上一章所述，下面的语句在Scala中导入Chisel:</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [2]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3._</span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3.util._</span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3.iotesters.</span><span class='o'>{</span><span class='nc'>ChiselFlatSpec</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='nc'>Driver</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='nc'>PeekPokeTester</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[2]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-green-fg'>import </span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>chisel3._</span><span class='ansi-green-fg'>import </span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>chisel3.util._</span><span class='ansi-green-fg'>import </span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>chisel3.iotesters.{ChiselFlatSpec, Driver, PeekPokeTester}</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='您的第一个Chisel模块'>您的第一个Chisel模块</h1><p>本节将介绍一个简单的硬件模块的实现，测试用例以及如何运行它。它可能会包含许多您还不理解的东西，不需要太纠结于细节，我们还会不断地回到这个例子来强化您所学到的东西。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**例子：一个模块**</span><br>类似于Verilog，我们可以在Chisel中定义模块（module）。下面的例子是一个名字叫做<code>Passthrough</code>的Chisel <code>Module</code>，它有一个4比特的输入，名字叫做<code>in</code>，还有一个4比特的输出<code>out</code>。这个模块的组合电路中将输入<code>in</code>连接到输出<code>out</code>，所以<code>out</code>由<code>in</code>驱动。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [3]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// Chisel代码：定义一个模块</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>Passthrough</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[3]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>Passthrough</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>上面的代码包含了许多东西，以下我们会详细解释代码的每一行：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>Passthrough</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span></pre></div><p>我们定义了一个模块，名字叫做<code>Passthrough</code>。 <code>Module</code>是一个Chisel内建的类，所有的硬件模块都必须从它继承。</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(...)</span></pre></div><p>我们在一个叫做<code>io</code>的常量中声明所有的输入输出端口。这个常量的名称必须叫做<code>io</code>，并且它必须是类<code>IO</code>的对象或实例。这个类要求一个实例化的Bundle：<code>IO(_instantiated_bundle_)</code>。</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(...)</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(...)</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div><p>我们声明了一个新的硬件结构类型（Bundle），它包含了信号<code>in</code>和<code>out</code>，这两个信号分别带有方向Input和Output。</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div><p>我们声明了一个信号的硬件类型，它是宽度为4的无符号整数。</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span></pre></div><p>我们将输入端口和输出端口连接，这里<code>io.in</code> 会<em>驱动</em> <code>io.out</code>。注意<code>:=</code>操作符是一个<strong><em>Chisel</em></strong>操作符，它表示右边的信号驱动左边的信号，它具有方向性。</p><p>硬件构造语言（HCL）的巧妙之处在于我们可以使用底层编程语言Scala作为脚本语言。例如，在定义了上面的Chisel模块之后，我们可以使用Scala调用Chisel编译器来将Chisel的<code>Passthrough</code>描述转换成为Verilog的<code>Passthrough</code>描述。这一步叫做<strong><em>展开（elaboration）</em></strong>。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [4]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// Scala代码：将Chisel的设计展开成为Verilog设计</span><span class='c1'>//下面生成的代码比较复杂，看不懂的话不需要太担心</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getVerilog</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Passthrough</span><span class='o'>))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.002] Elaborating design...[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.605] Done elaborating.Total FIRRTL Compile Time: 476.9 msmodule cmd2HelperPassthrough( input clock, input reset, input [3:0] io_in, output [3:0] io_out); assign io_out = io_in; // @[cmd2.sc 6:10]endmodule</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>注意上面生成的Verilog模块叫做<code>cmd<#>HelperPassthrough</code>，这是因为在jupyter里面运行的关系。在正常的环境中，名字应该就叫做<code>Passthrough</code>。不过这是重要的一课：虽然Chisel会尽可能的保留硬件模块或者其他硬件组件的名称，但是并不能保证总是这样。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**例子：一个模块生成器（Generator）**</span><br>如果我们将Scala的知识应用于这个例子，我们可以看到Chisel模块是由Scala类实现的。就像任何其他的Scala类一样，我们可以使用一些参数来构造Chisel模块。在这个例子中，我们定义了一个叫做<code>PassthroughGenerator</code>的类，它有一个叫做<code>width</code>的整型的构造参数，用来描述输入输出端口的宽度：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [5]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// Chisel代码，包含一个构造参数来描述端口的宽度</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>PassthroughGenerator</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>width</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>width</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>width</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='c1'>// 我们现在可以用它来生成不同宽度的模块</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getVerilog</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>PassthroughGenerator</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>)))</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getVerilog</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>PassthroughGenerator</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>20</span><span class='o'>)))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] Elaborating design...[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.077] Done elaborating.Total FIRRTL Compile Time: 29.1 msmodule cmd4HelperPassthroughGenerator( input clock, input reset, input [9:0] io_in, output [9:0] io_out); assign io_out = io_in; // @[cmd4.sc 6:10]endmodule[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] Elaborating design...[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.005] Done elaborating.Total FIRRTL Compile Time: 27.8 msmodule cmd4HelperPassthroughGenerator( input clock, input reset, input [19:0] io_in, output [19:0] io_out); assign io_out = io_in; // @[cmd4.sc 6:10]endmodule</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[5]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>PassthroughGenerator</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>注意上面生成的Verilog会根据<code>width</code>参数的值使用不同的输入/输出位宽。我们可以深入理解一下这是如何工作的，因为Chisel模块就是一个普通的Scala类，所以我们可以使用Scala类的构造函数来参数化我们的设计。</p><p>这里的可以这样参数化的原因是因为我们使用了<em>Scala</em>，而不是<em>Chisel</em>。Chisel并没有别的API来使得我们可以参数化一个设计。然而我们却可以依赖Scala来使得参数化成为可能。</p><p>在这里，因为<code>PassthroughGenerator</code>并不只是用来描述一个设计，它其实描述了以<code>width</code>为参数的一系列设计，所以我们将<code>Passthrough</code>称为一个<strong><em>生成器（generator）</em></strong>。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='测试您的硬件'>测试您的硬件</h1><p>没有测试，任何的硬件模块或生成器都不能称为一个完整的设计。本教程也会介绍Chisel内置的测试功能。下面的例子是一个Chisel测试，它将值传递给模块<code>Passthrough</code>的输入端口<code>in</code>，并检查输出端口<code>out</code>上是否能看到相同的值。</p><p><span style='color:blue'>**例子：一个测试**</span><br>这里有一些高级的Scala语法。但是，除了<code>poke</code>和<code>expect</code>语句之外，您不需要理解其他任何东西。您可以将其余代码视为简单的样板来编写这些简单的测试。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [6]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// Scala代码：调用驱动（Driver）来实例化 Passthrough 和 PeekPokeTester，并且运行测试。</span><span class='c1'>// 如果不理解下面代码的话不要担心；这是非常复杂的Scala代码。</span><span class='c1'>// 可以简单地把它想象成运行Chisel测试的样板</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>testResult</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Driver</span><span class='o'>(()</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Passthrough</span><span class='o'>())</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>c</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>PeekPokeTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>0</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 将输入设置成 0</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>0</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 检查输出是否为 0</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 将输入设置成 1</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 检查输出是否为 1</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 将输入设置成 2</span> <span class='n'>expect</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 检查输出是否为 2</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>testResult</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// Scala代码：如果testResult等于false的话,，这里会抛出异常</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"SUCCESS!!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// Scala代码：到这里，我们的测试已经通过了</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] Elaborating design...[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.068] Done elaborating.Total FIRRTL Compile Time: 19.0 msTotal FIRRTL Compile Time: 10.5 msEnd of dependency graphCircuit state created[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.001] SEED 1561161438550test cmd2HelperPassthrough Success: 3 tests passed in 5 cycles taking 0.017532 seconds[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.007] RAN 0 CYCLES PASSEDSUCCESS!!</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[6]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>testResult</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Boolean</span> = true</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>上面发生了什么？这个测试接受一个类型为<code>Passthrough</code>的模块，驱动它的输入，并且检查它的输出。我们调用<code>poke</code>来驱动输入，调用<code>expect</code>来检查输出。如果不使用<code>expect</code>来比较期望值的话（没有断言的话），也可以使用<code>peek</code>来读出输出值。</p><p>如果所有的<code>expect</code>语句都为真，上面的代码会返回真（见<code>testResult</code>）。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><span style='color:red'>**练习：写一个您自己的测试**</span><br>写两个测试，一个用来测试位宽为10的<code>PassthroughGenerator</code>，另一个测试位宽为20的<code>PassthroughGenerator</code>。至少检查两个值：0和最大值。注意这里三个问号<code>???</code>在Scala中有特殊含义。直接运行下面的代码会有未被实现<code>NotImplementedError</code>的错误。将下面的<code>???</code>替换成您自己的代码：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [ ]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>test10result</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='o'>???</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>test20result</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='o'>???</span><span class='n'>assert</span><span class='o'>((</span><span class='n'>test10result</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>&&</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>test20result</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>))</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"SUCCESS!!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// Scala Code: if we get here, our tests passed!</span></pre></div> </div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><div id='container'><section id='accordion'><div><input type='checkbox' id='check-1' /><label for='check-1'><strong>答案</strong> (点击这里显示)</label><article><pre style='background-color:#f7f7f7'>val test10result = Driver(() => new PassthroughGenerator(10)) { c => new PeekPokeTester(c) { poke(c.io.in, 0) expect(c.io.out, 0) poke(c.io.in, 1023) expect(c.io.out, 1023) }}val test20result = Driver(() => new PassthroughGenerator(20)) { c => new PeekPokeTester(c) { poke(c.io.in, 0) expect(c.io.out, 0) poke(c.io.in, 1048575) expect(c.io.out, 1048575) }}</pre></article></div></section></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='看一看生成的Verilog/FIRRTL'>看一看生成的Verilog/FIRRTL</h1><p>如果您无法理解Chisel描述的硬件并且习惯于阅读Verilog或FIRRTL（Chisel的中间语言相当于Verilog的可综合子集），那么您可以尝试看看所生成的Verilog。</p><p>以下是生成Verilog（之前已经看过），以及FIRRTL的例子：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [8]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// 查看生成的 Verilog 代码</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getVerilog</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Passthrough</span><span class='o'>))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] Elaborating design...[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.004] Done elaborating.Total FIRRTL Compile Time: 20.5 msmodule cmd2HelperPassthrough( input clock, input reset, input [3:0] io_in, output [3:0] io_out); assign io_out = io_in; // @[cmd2.sc 6:10]endmodule</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [9]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// 查看生成的 FIRRTL 代码</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>getFirrtl</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Passthrough</span><span class='o'>))</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] Elaborating design...[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.070] Done elaborating.;buildInfoPackage: chisel3, version: 3.2-SNAPSHOT, scalaVersion: 2.12.6, sbtVersion: 1.2.7circuit cmd2HelperPassthrough : module cmd2HelperPassthrough : input clock : Clock input reset : UInt<1> output io : {flip in : UInt<4>, out : UInt<4>} io.out <= io.in @[cmd2.sc 6:10] </pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='本节结束!'>本节结束!</h1><p></p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='-附录：解释一下用“printf”来调试'><span style='color:red'> 附录：解释一下用“printf”来调试</span></h2><p> 并不总是最好的办法，但是通常可以作为调试的第一步。</p><p>因为Chisel生成器是用来生成硬件的程序，需要好好区分是在生成电路的时候打印还是在运行电路的时候打印。</p><p>下面是想要打印的三种常见的场景：</p><ul><li>Chisel生成器在生成电路的时候打印</li><li>在运行电路仿真的时候打印 </li><li>在测试的时候打印</li></ul><p><code>println</code>是Scala内嵌的打印函数。它<strong>不可以</strong>用于电路仿真的时候打印，因为生成的电路是FIRRTL或者Verilog，而不是Scala。</p><p>下面的代码展示了这三种场景：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [10]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>PrintingModule</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>Module</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>io</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>IO</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>Bundle</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>in</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Input</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>out</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>Output</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='nc'>UInt</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mf'>4.</span><span class='n'>W</span><span class='o'>))</span> <span class='o'>})</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>out</span> <span class='o'>:=</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span> <span class='n'>printf</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"Print during simulation: Input is %d\n"</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// chisel printf 的被解析的字符串有自己的语法</span> <span class='n'>printf</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>p</span><span class='s'>"Print during simulation: IO is $io\n"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"Print during generation: Input is </span><span class='si'>${</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='si'>}</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>PrintingModuleTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>PrintingModule</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>extends</span> <span class='nc'>PeekPokeTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>poke</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>3</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>step</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>5</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 每次运行Chisel电路会打印</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"Print during testing: Input is </span><span class='si'>${</span><span class='n'>peek</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>io</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>in</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='si'>}</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>chisel3</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>iotesters</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>Driver</span><span class='o'>(</span> <span class='o'>()</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>PrintingModule</span> <span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>c</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>PrintingModuleTester</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] Elaborating design...Print during generation: Input is UInt<4>(IO in unelaborated cmd9$Helper$PrintingModule)[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.027] Done elaborating.Total FIRRTL Compile Time: 30.7 msTotal FIRRTL Compile Time: 18.8 msEnd of dependency graphCircuit state created[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.000] SEED 1561161468619Print during simulation: Input is 3Print during simulation: IO is AnonymousBundle(in -> 3, out -> 3)Print during simulation: Input is 3Print during simulation: IO is AnonymousBundle(in -> 3, out -> 3)Print during simulation: Input is 3Print during simulation: IO is AnonymousBundle(in -> 3, out -> 3)Print during simulation: Input is 3Print during simulation: IO is AnonymousBundle(in -> 3, out -> 3)Print during simulation: Input is 3Print during simulation: IO is AnonymousBundle(in -> 3, out -> 3)[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.013] Print during testing: Input is 3test cmd9HelperPrintingModule Success: 0 tests passed in 10 cycles taking 0.022628 seconds[<span class='ansi-magenta-fg'>info</span>] [0.014] RAN 5 CYCLES PASSED</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[10]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>PrintingModule</span>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>PrintingModuleTester</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res9_2</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Boolean</span> = true</pre></div></div></div></div></div> </div> </div></body> </html>" style="scrolling:no;"></iframe><script>$("#ipynb").load( function() {console.log($("#ipynb").contents().find("body").find("#notebook"));document.getElementById('ipynb').height=$("#ipynb").contents().find("#notebook").height()+100;})</script> </div><blockquote><p>本系列教程的英文版来自于<a href="https://github.com/freechipsproject/chisel-bootcamp" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Chisel Bootcamp</a>。</p></blockquote><blockquote><p>注意：本文不支持微软的Edge浏览器，请使用Chrome或者Safari，谢谢！</p></blockquote>
