Elsewhere // we use CSS to left justify single line equations in code cells. displayAlign: 'center', 'HTML-CSS': { styles: {'.MathJax_Display': {'margin': 0}}, linebreaks: { automatic: true } } }); </script> <!-- End of mathjax configuration --></head><body> <div tabindex='-1' id='notebook' class='border-box-sizing'> <div class='container' id='notebook-container'><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h1 id='第一章：Scala介绍'>第一章：Scala介绍</h1><h2 id='本教程的目的'>本教程的目的</h2><p>这些教程使用<em>Jupyter</em>笔记本环境，您可以阅读代码，进行更改，并运行代码。我们鼓励您尝试使用教程中的代码来更快地掌握Chisel。</p><p>在第一章中，您将学习如何编写基本的Scala代码以及如何阅读更高级的Scala代码。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='理解Scala'>理解Scala</h1><p>Scala is yet another programming language which supports common programming paradigms. We chose to use it for several reasons:</p><p>Scala是一种支持常见编程范例的编程语言。我们选择使用它有几个原因：</p><ul><li>它能更好的嵌入领域专用语言（DSL）。</li><li>它拥有强大而优雅的库，包含各种数据集合。</li><li>它具有严格的类型系统，有助于在开发周期的早期（编译时）捕获大量错误。</li><li>它具有强大的函数式编程方式。</li><li>Chisel更好发音。</li></ul><p>之后我们讨论Chisel时，以上这些要点都会慢慢显现出来。不过现在，我们将专注于阅读和编写基本的Scala代码。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='变量和常量---var-和-val'>变量和常量 - var 和 val</h1><p>创建变量和常量的语句前面分别带有关键字<em>var</em>和<em>val</em>。通常的做法是尽可能使用<em>val</em>。这是为了防止之后给变量错误地重新赋值，从而使代码难以阅读。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [1]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>6</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>kittensPerHouse</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>101</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>alphabet</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='s'>"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"</span><span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>done</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='kc'>false</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[1]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>numberOfKittens</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>6</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>kittensPerHouse</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>101</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>alphabet</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>String</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>done</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Boolean</span> = false</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>首先要注意的是，与Java和C不同，Scala语句结尾通常不需要分号。当有换行符时，Scala会自动判断是否语句结束。例如，当行上的最后一个符号是操作符的话，Scala通常可以判断单个语句是否分布在多行中。需要分号的唯一情况是您希望将多个语句放在一行上的时候。</p><p>上面的常量和变量很清楚。两个变量<code>var</code>可以被重新赋值，而两个常量<code>val</code>在被创建之后就是不可变的。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [2]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='o'>+=</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='c1'>// kittensPerHouse = kittensPerHouse * 2 // 这一句会出错; 常量kittensPerHouse不可更改</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>alphabet</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>done</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='kc'>true</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='条件语句'>条件语句</h1><p>Scala中的条件语句与其他编程语言类似。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [3]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// 一个简单的条件语句 (这是注释)</span><span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='o'>></span> <span class='n'>kittensPerHouse</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"Too many kittens!!!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='c1'>// 如果只有一行语句的话大括号不是必须的。但是，Scala代码规范</span><span class='c1'>// 希望只有在"else"部分出现的时候才省略大括号。</span><span class='c1'>// (最好不要像下面这样...)</span><span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='o'>></span> <span class='n'>kittensPerHouse</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"Too many kittens!!!"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='c1'>// 下面的if语句包含else部分，所以可以在这里省略大括号</span><span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>done</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"we are done"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>else</span> <span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='o'>+=</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='c1'>// 下面是“else if”部分</span><span class='c1'>// 代码规范上，因为代码块超过一行，所以都使用了大括号</span><span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>done</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"we are done"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='k'>else</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='o'><</span> <span class='n'>kittensPerHouse</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"more kittens!"</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>numberOfKittens</span> <span class='o'>+=</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='k'>else</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>done</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='kc'>true</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>we are donewe are done</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>但在Scala中，“<code>if</code>”语句会返回值。它的值由所选分支的最后一行语句决定。这非常强大，特别是在函数中或类中初始化值的时候。类似下面这样：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [4]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>likelyCharactersSet</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>alphabet</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>length</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='mi'>26</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='s'>"english"</span><span class='k'>else</span> <span class='s'>"not english"</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>likelyCharactersSet</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>english</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[4]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>likelyCharactersSet</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>String</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>"english"</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>我们创建了常量<em>likelyCharactersSet</em>，并且它的值是在运行时才被确定。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='方法（Methods），函数（Functions）'>方法（Methods），函数（Functions）</h1><p>方法使用关键字<code>def</code>定义。在这里，我们不予区分将它们也称为函数。函数的参数由逗号分隔，包含参数的名称，类型以及默认值（可选）。为清楚起见，应指定返回类型。</p><p>没有任何参数的Scala函数定义后面不需要空括号。这使得类的成员变量要改成函数，并来自于计算结果的情况下更加容易。按照惯例，不改变任何东西的无参数的函数（调用它们不会改变任何东西，它们只是返回一个值）不使用括号；而会给这个类带来改变的函数（也许它们会改变类里面的变量或打印出来东西）要使用括号。</p><h2 id='简单的声明（Declarations）'>简单的声明（Declarations）</h2></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [5]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// 简单的乘以一个系数, 例如，times2(3) 返回 6</span><span class='c1'>// 代码块只有一行，所以省略了大括号</span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>times2</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='mi'>2</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='c1'>// 更复杂的函数</span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>distance</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>y</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>returnPositive</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>xy</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>returnPositive</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>xy</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>abs</span> <span class='k'>else</span> <span class='o'>-</span><span class='n'>xy</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>abs</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[5]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>times2</span>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>distance</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='函数的重载'>函数的重载</h2><p>重载意味着可以使用相同的函数名称，而参数及其类型不同，这时候编译器会自动确定应该调用哪个版本的函数。但是应该尽量避免重载函数。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [6]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// 函数重载</span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>times2</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='mi'>2</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>times2</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>String</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='mi'>2</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>toInt</span><span class='n'>times2</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>5</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='n'>times2</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"7"</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[6]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>times2</span>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>times2</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res5_2</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>10</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res5_3</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>14</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><h2 id='递归和嵌套函数调用'>递归和嵌套函数调用</h2><p>大括号定义代码的范围。在一个函数的范围内可以存在递归或嵌套调用。在某个范围内定义的函数只能在该范围内访问。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [7]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='cm'>/** 打印一个由“X”组成的三角形</span><span class='cm'> * （这是另一种注释的方式）</span><span class='cm'> */</span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>asciiTriangle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>rows</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='c1'>// 这里很有趣：将字符串"X"乘以一个整数会得到由许多重复"X"构成的字符串</span> <span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>printRow</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>columns</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Unit</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"X"</span> <span class='o'>*</span> <span class='n'>columns</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='k'>if</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>rows</span> <span class='o'>></span> <span class='mi'>0</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>printRow</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>rows</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='n'>asciiTriangle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>rows</span> <span class='o'>-</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 这里是递归</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='c1'>// printRow(1) // 这样调用会出错，因为printRow不是定义在当前作用域中</span><span class='n'>asciiTriangle</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>6</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[7]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>asciiTriangle</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='列表（Lists）'>列表（Lists）</h1><p>Scala实现了各种聚合或序列对象。列表list与数组array非常类似，但支持更多访问或追加元素的操作。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [8]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>7</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>14</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>list1</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>List</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>3</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>list2</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='o'>::</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>::</span> <span class='n'>y</span> <span class='o'>::</span> <span class='nc'>Nil</span> <span class='c1'>// 另一种列表的构造方法</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>list3</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>list1</span> <span class='o'>++</span> <span class='n'>list2</span> <span class='c1'>// 连接两个列表</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>m</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>list2</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>length</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>s</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>list2</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>size</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>headOfList</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>list1</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>head</span> <span class='c1'>// 取列表的第一个元素</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>restOfList</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>list1</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>tail</span> <span class='c1'>// 得到去掉第一个元素的新的列表 </span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>third</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>list1</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='c1'>// 列表的第三个元素（下标从0开始）</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[8]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>x</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>7</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>y</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>14</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>list1</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>2</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>list2</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>7</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>14</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>14</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>list3</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>2</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>7</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>14</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>14</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>m</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>s</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>headOfList</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>restOfList</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>2</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>third</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='for-语句'><code>for</code> 语句</h1><p>Scala有<code>for</code>语句，完全类似于别的语言，可以用来进行遍历。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [9]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='n'>to</span> <span class='mi'>7</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>print</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='s'>" "</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>()</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 </pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>如果上面用的是<code>until</code>而不是<code>to</code>的话，遍历就是从0到6（不包含7）。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [10]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='n'>until</span> <span class='mi'>7</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>print</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='s'>" "</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>()</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>0 1 2 3 4 5 6 </pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>在<code>for</code>语句加入<code>by</code>表示步长。下面的代码会打印出从0到10之间的偶数。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [11]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>for</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='n'>to</span> <span class='mi'>10</span> <span class='n'>by</span> <span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>print</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>i</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='s'>" "</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>()</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>0 2 4 6 8 10 </pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>If you have a collection of some kind and want to visit all of the elements, you can use <code>for</code>as an <em>iterator</em>, as in Java and Python. Here we make a list of 4 random integers and then sum them.</p><p>如果你有一个集合并想要访问所有元素，你可以使用<code>for</code>来作为<em>迭代器（iterator）</em>，类似于Java或者Python中一样。下面的代码里，我们列出4个随机整数，然后对它们求和。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [12]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>randomList</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>List</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>scala</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>util</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>Random</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nextInt</span><span class='o'>(),</span> <span class='n'>scala</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>util</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>Random</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nextInt</span><span class='o'>(),</span> <span class='n'>scala</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>util</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>Random</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nextInt</span><span class='o'>(),</span> <span class='n'>scala</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>util</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='nc'>Random</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>nextInt</span><span class='o'>())</span><span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>listSum</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>0</span><span class='k'>for</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>value</span> <span class='k'><-</span> <span class='n'>randomList</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>listSum</span> <span class='o'>+=</span> <span class='n'>value</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"sum is "</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>listSum</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>sum is -381288124</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[12]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>randomList</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>-348678184</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>2118016949</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>2118650181</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>25690226</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>listSum</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>-381288124</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>Scala中的<code>for</code>可以非常直观地用于遍历。但是还有一类称为<em>comprehensions</em>的函数，在许多场合下使用起来更为方便，例如可以更容易地对数组元素求和。这些将在后面的章节中予以介绍。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='怎样读Scala代码'>怎样读Scala代码</h1><p>能够阅读Scala代码并理解常见的命名约定，设计模式和最佳实践是成为有效的Chisel程序员重要的一步。代码的重用是Chisel的优势之一，但这需要阅读并理解别人的代码。有效地解析别人的代码也可以更容易地寻求帮助，例如利用StackOverflow等资源。</p><p>接下来这一节会展示一些常见的代码模式。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='包（Packages）和导入（Imports）'>包（Packages）和导入（Imports）</h1><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>package</span> <span class='nn'>mytools</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>Tool1</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='o'>...</span> <span class='o'>}</span></pre></div><p>上面定义了一个包（Packages，当需要在别的代码中导入的时候，如下：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>mytools.Tool1</span></pre></div><p>注意：包的名字<strong>必须</strong>和路径的层级一致。这不是强制的要求，但如果不遵守的话，可能会产生一些难以诊断的问题。按照约定，包的名称应该是小写的，不包含下划线之类的分隔符。这样的名称有时会变得阅读很困难，一种方法是添加另一层层次结构，例如<code>package good.tools</code>。尽你所能遵循这些约定吧，但是Chisel本身也存在一些不符合这些规则的情况。</p><p>如上所示，<code>import</code>语句用来告诉编译器您需要使用其他的库。在Chisel编程时常见导入如下面所示：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3._</span><span class='k'>import</span> <span class='nn'>chisel3.iotesters.</span><span class='o'>{</span><span class='nc'>ChiselFlatSpec</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='nc'>Driver</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='nc'>PeekPokeTester</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div><p>第一行导入的是chisel3包中的所有类和方法；下划线在这里用作通配符。第二行表示从chisel3.iotesters包中导入指定的类。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='Scala是一个面向对象的编程语言'>Scala是一个面向对象的编程语言</h1><p>Scala是一个面向对象的编程语言，了解这一点很重要，这也是Scala和Chisel的一个很大的优势。</p><ol><li>变量是对象。</li><li>运用<code>val</code>声明的常量也是对象。</li><li>甚至literal也是对象（例如，1，2，3，字符串等）。</li><li>函数本身也是对象。这之后会详细说明。</li><li>对象（Object）是类（class）的实例。<ol><li>事实上，<em>面向对象</em>中的<em>对象（object）</em> 在Scala中被称为实例。</li></ol></li><li>在定义一个类的时候，需要指定：<ol><li>类中的数据（<code>val</code>, <code>var</code>）</li><li>类的操作，称为方法（method）或者函数（function）。这些方法可以通过该类的实例来调用。</li></ol></li><li>类可以从其他类继承。<ol><li>被继承的类叫做父类，继承的类叫做子类。</li><li>在这种情况下，子类继承父类的所有数据成员和方法。</li><li>子类也可以扩展或重载从父类继承的这些方法。</li></ol></li><li>类也可以继承自特征（traits）。Traits可以被看作是轻量级的类，它可以允许多继承。 </li><li>（Singleton）Object对象在Scala中是一个特殊的类。<ol><li>它们不是上面所说的对象，上面那些我们称之为实例。</li></ol></li></ol><p>我们接下来会看怎么创建对象：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='类的例子'>类的例子</h1><p>下面是一个创建Scala类的例子：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [13]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// WrapCounter从0开始计数，一直到最大值然后归零</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>WrapCounter</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>counterBits</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>max</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Long</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span> <span class='o'><<</span> <span class='n'>counterBits</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>-</span> <span class='mi'>1</span> <span class='k'>var</span> <span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>0L</span> <span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>inc</span><span class='o'>()</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Long</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='mi'>1</span> <span class='k'>if</span> <span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='o'>></span> <span class='n'>max</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>0</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='o'>}</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>s"counter created with max value </span><span class='si'>$max</span><span class='s'>"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[13]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>WrapCounter</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>在上面的代码中：</p><ul><li><code>class WrapCounter</code> --这是类<strong>WrapCounter</strong>的定义.</li><li><code>(counterBits: Int)</code> -- 创建一个WrapCounter实例需要一个整数类型的参数，名称为<code>counterBits</code>。</li><li>大括号 ({}) 里面是这个类的代码块。大部分的类在这里面定义变量，常量和方法。</li><li><code>val max: Long =</code> -- 这个类包含一个叫<strong>max</strong>的成员常量, 类型是<code>Long</code>，并且在创建类的实例时被初始化。</li><li><code>(1 << counterBits) - 1</code> 计算<strong>counterBits</strong>这么多比特所能表示的最大值。<strong>max</strong>在这里由<code>val</code>创建，所以它是常量，之后不能被改变。</li><li>变量 <strong>counter</strong> 在这里被创建出来，并且赋初值为 <strong>0L</strong> ， “L” 在这里表示0是一个长整型，所以编译器也会推定 <strong>counter</strong> 为长整型。</li><li><strong>max</strong> 和 <strong>counter</strong>通常被称为该类的 <em>成员变量（或常量）</em>。</li><li>该类定义了一个叫<strong>inc</strong>的方法，该方法不需要参数并且返回一个长整型 <strong>Long</strong> 的值。</li><li>方法 <strong>inc</strong> 包含如下代码：<ul><li><code>counter = counter + 1</code> 递增 <strong>counter</strong>.</li><li><code>if (counter > max) { counter = 0 }</code> 检查counter是否大于最大值<strong>max</strong>，如果大于的话，重置成0。</li><li><code>counter</code> -- 最后这一行很重要<ul><li>一个代码块的最后一行被认为是该代码块的返回值，调用者可以使用或忽略该返回值。</li><li>这是一个通用的办法；例如，在<code>if</code>和<code>else</code>语句中，真假分支都可以是代码块，所以<code>if...else</code>语句也可以返回值：例如<code>val result = if (10 * 10 > 90) 'greater' else 'lesser'</code>的返回值就是'greater'。</li></ul></li><li>所以在这里，方法<strong>inc</strong>的返回值就是<strong>counter</strong>。</li></ul></li><li><code>println(s'counter created with max value $max')</code> 在标准输出stdout中打印出一个字符串。由于<strong>println</strong>直接位于定义类的代码块中，所以它会在每一次创建该类的实例时都会被运行。</li><li>这里打印的字符串是一个<em>被解析（interpolated）的</em> 字符串。<ul><li>在引号前面的 <strong>s</strong> 表示这是一个被解析的字符串。</li><li>被解析的字符串会在运行的时候才被处理。</li><li>字符串中的 <strong>\$max</strong> 会被变量max的值所替换。</li><li>如果<strong>\$</strong> 后面跟的是任意Scala代码块的话，这个代码块可以包含任何Scala语句。<ul><li>例如，<strong><code>println(s'doubled max is ${max + max}')</code></strong>.</li><li>这个代码块的返回值将会替换掉字符串中的 <code>${...}</code>。</li><li>如果返回值不是字符串，则会被转换为1；理论上scala中几乎每个类型都可以隐式地转换为字符串）。</li></ul></li><li>除非您正在调试，否则应该避免类似这样每次创建类的实例时都要打印的内容，以避免标准输出显示了太多东西。</li></ul></li></ul></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='创建类的实例'>创建类的实例</h1><p>让我们使用上面的例子来创建一个类的实例。 Scala实例是通过关键字<code>new</code>来创建的。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [14]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>x</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='k'>new</span> <span class='nc'>WrapCounter</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt'></div><div class='output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text'><pre>counter created with max value 3</pre></div></div><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[14]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>x</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>WrapCounter</span> = ammonite.$sess.cmd12$Helper$WrapCounter@8833366</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>您可能也会看到不使用关键字<code>new</code>来创建的实例，例如<code>val y = WrapCounter(6)</code>。</p><p>这样的情况经常发生，特别值得注意，但需要使用companion对象。稍后会对此进行详细说明。</p><p>下面的代码会使用刚刚创建出来的实例（试试运行两次下面的单元格）。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [15]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>inc</span><span class='o'>()</span> <span class='c1'>// 递增计数器</span><span class='c1'>// 实例x的成员变量对外部可见（除非它们被声明为私有成员）</span><span class='k'>if</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>counter</span> <span class='o'>==</span> <span class='n'>x</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>max</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>println</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='s'>"counter is about to wrap"</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='o'>}</span><span class='n'>x</span> <span class='n'>inc</span><span class='o'>()</span> <span class='c1'>// Scala允许函数调用的时候省略“.”。这对于嵌入的领域专用语言（DSL）很有用处</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[15]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res14_0</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Long</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>1L</span><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>res14_2</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>Long</span> = <span class='ansi-green-fg'>2L</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='代码块'>代码块</h1><p>代码块由大括号分隔，可以包含零行或多行Scala代码。代码块的最后一行就是该代码块的返回值（返回值可以被调用者忽略）。没有任何代码的代码块会返回一个类似于null的特殊对象，名为<code>Unit</code>。Scala中有非常多的代码块：例如类的定义，函数和方法的定义，也可以是<code>if</code>语句的子句，或者构成<code>for</code>语句主体，等等。</p><h2 id='参数化的代码块'>参数化的代码块</h2><p>代码块也可以带参数。在定义类或者方法的时候，这些参数看起来与其他传统编程语言类似。在下面的例子中，<code>c</code>和<code>s</code>是代码块的参数：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [16]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='c1'>// 只包含一条语句的代码块不需要大括号</span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>add1</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>c</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='n'>c</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='mi'>1</span><span class='k'>class</span> <span class='nc'>RepeatString</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>s</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>String</span><span class='o'>)</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>repeatedString</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>s</span> <span class='o'>+</span> <span class='n'>s</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[16]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>function</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>add1</span>defined <span class='ansi-green-fg'>class</span> <span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>RepeatString</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p><strong>重要</strong>：还有另一种方法可以参数化代码块。下面是例子：</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered'><div class='input'><div class='prompt input_prompt'>In [17]:</div><div class='inner_cell'> <div class='input_area'><div class=' highlight hl-scala'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>intList</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='nc'>List</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='mi'>1</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>2</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='mi'>3</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>val</span> <span class='n'>stringList</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='n'>intList</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>map</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='n'>i</span> <span class='k'>=></span> <span class='n'>i</span><span class='o'>.</span><span class='n'>toString</span><span class='o'>}</span></pre></div> </div></div></div><div class='output_wrapper'><div class='output'><div class='output_area'> <div class='prompt output_prompt'>Out[17]:</div><div class='output_text output_subarea output_execute_result'><pre><span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>intList</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>Int</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>1</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>2</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>3</span>)<span class='ansi-cyan-fg'>stringList</span>: <span class='ansi-green-fg'>List</span>[<span class='ansi-green-fg'>String</span>] = <span class='ansi-yellow-fg'>List</span>(<span class='ansi-green-fg'>"1"</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>"2"</span>, <span class='ansi-green-fg'>"3"</span>)</pre></div></div></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>代码块被传递给List类的<code>map</code>方法。<code>map</code>方法需要一个代码块的参数，从而为列表的每个成员调用该代码块。这里传入的代码块的意思是将元素转换为字符串表示。Scala在许多地方都可以用类似的语法，您可能在不同的地方以不同的方式看到它。这种类型的代码块被称为匿名函数，稍后的章节中会介绍有关匿名函数更详细的信息。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><p>这里的目标是帮助您在遇到时能够识别它们。随着更多地使用Scala，这样的代码会看起来更加舒适和熟悉。作者更倾向于使用特定的风格，这里也有个人喜好的问题。使用一行表示的代码（One-liner）会使代码看起来更紧凑，而使用复杂的代码块通常看起来更容易懂。为了使沟通和协作更容易，可以阅读。</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='用参数名进行调用，以及默认参数'>用参数名进行调用，以及默认参数</h1><p>看下面的方法定义：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='k'>def</span> <span class='n'>myMethod</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>count</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>wrap</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Boolean</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>wrapValue</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Int</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='mi'>24</span><span class='o'>)</span><span class='k'>:</span> <span class='kt'>Unit</span> <span class='o'>=</span> <span class='o'>{</span> <span class='o'>...</span> <span class='o'>}</span></pre></div><p>调用方法时，可以同时使用参数名和参数值：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>myMethod</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>count</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>wrap</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>wrapValue</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>23</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div><p>使用参数名传递参数的话可以在调用时不在乎参数的顺序：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>myMethod</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>wrapValue</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>23</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>wrap</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>count</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div><p>对于经常调用的方法，参数的顺序可能很明显。但是对于不太常用的方法，特别是布尔参数，调用时使用参数名可以使您的代码更具可读性。如果方法需要传递的参数许多都是相同的类型，使用参数名也可以减少出错的可能性。类的参数也一样（通常只是类的构造函数的参数）。</p><p>当特定的参数有默认值的时候, 调用者只需要（通过参数名）传入那些没有默认值的参数即可。例如在上面，参数<code>wrapValue</code>的默认值是24。 所以下面的代码：</p><div class='highlight'><pre><span></span><span class='n'>myMethod</span><span class='o'>(</span><span class='n'>wrap</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='kc'>false</span><span class='o'>,</span> <span class='n'>count</span> <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='mi'>10</span><span class='o'>)</span></pre></div><p>会认为<code>wrapValue</code>参数已经传入了24.</p></div></div></div><div class='cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered'><div class='prompt input_prompt'></div><div class='inner_cell'><div class='text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html'><hr><h1 id='第一章结束'>第一章结束</h1><p></p></div></div></div> </div> </div></body> </html>" entry.title: BOOM项目介绍
entry.content:
BOOM是伯克利乱序执行机器（Berkeley Out-of-Order Machine）的缩写，采用Chisel硬件构造语言编写，是一款开源的，可综合，参数化的RV64GC RISC-V核心（core）的实现。

Github上的位置在：https://github.com/riscv-boom/riscv-boom。一般通过boom-template来编译和生成SoC。

默认参数的BOOM流水线 (图片来自BOOM文档)

BOOM是一个超标量，乱序执行的核心，具有当代CPU的大部分特征。建构在Rocket Chip SoC之上，大约有1万6千行Chisel代码。可以用来学习现代CPU设计，研究安全问题，甚至可以拿来tape out芯片。目前还是一个活跃的项目，并在持续更新之中。

微架构文档的位置：https://docs.boom-core.org/en/latest/

从概念上讲，BOOM流水线分为10个阶段：指令读取（Fetch），指令解码（Decode），寄存器重命名（Register Rename），调度（Dispatch），发射（Issue），读取寄存器（Register Read），执行（Execute），内存操作（Memory），写回（Writeback）和提交（Commit）。但是，许多这些阶段在当前的实现中可以合并起来，实际上是七个阶段。

BOOM复用了Rocket Chip的SoC

如上图所示，BOOM将Rocket Chip SoC当做模块库来使用，并且提供了BOOM tile来替换了原来的Rocket Tile。

entry.title: Rocket Chip介绍
entry.content:
Rocket Chip是基于Chisel开发的一款开源SoC生成器（Generator，生成器的概念请参考本站对于Chisel的介绍），它包含了由core，cache以及互连（interconnect）等构成的模块库，以此为基础构成一个完整的SoC，并可以生成可综合的RTL代码。

该项目可以追溯到2011年，来自于RISC-V和Chisel的两个项目结合，至今为止已经成功的tape out过十几次。

Github上的repo可以在这里找到：https://github.com/freechipsproject/rocket-chip

Rocket Chip生成器包含: A) Core生成器 B) Cache缓存生成器
C) RoCC协处理器生成器 D) Tile块生成器 E) TileLink生成器 F) 外设

图片来自Rocket Chip Tech Report

Rocket Chip有两个主要的用途：

第一个是它可以用来生成RISC-V的RTL实现，该实现具有顺序执行的流水线，符合IEEE标准的浮点运算单元，多级cache，虚拟内存，以及其他相关模块。

另一个用途是把Rocket Chip当做“函数库”来使用，只复用其中的某个部分。例如伯克利的另一个项目BOOM（RISC-V的另一个乱序执行superscalar实现）就把Rocket Chip当做模块库来使用，并只需要重新实现其中的core和cache部分。

Rocket Chip包含两种类型的模块：一种是工具utility，类似helper性质，用来帮助代码实现，并不直接生成硬件；另一种是硬件模块的生成器。（这里需要理解Scala和Chisel的区别，虽然Chisel是嵌在Scala里实现的，但是只有Chisel部分可以实际生成硬件）。这些模块的实现在src目录下。

其中，工具库包括：

  • config：用于描述参数的库（参数是指可以调整的一些值，进而可以生成一系列不同的硬件实现），只是为了方便调整生成器的参数。
  • diplomacy：在Chisel elaboration并开始生成RTL之前，用来协商模块到共享的interconnect之间的参数。
  • regmapper: 用来描述内存映射的寄存器，生成真正的寄存器实现，并连接到diplomacy总线上。
  • system: 可以理解为一个跑在JVM上的Scala应用，从而FIRRTL在上面可以跑起来并生成RTL代码。
  • unittest: 可综合的单元测试代码的框架。注意，这与Chisel的tester框架完全不同。
  • util: 文件系统的输入输出，例如在生成某个设计的时候将一些metadata输出到文件。

模块库（生成器）包括：

  • amba：AMBA总线的diplomacy实现。
  • devices：内存映射的外设实现，例如RAM，ROM等。
  • groundtest：用于内存系统集成测试的流量生成器，可综合。
  • interrupts：diplomacy实现的中断信号。
  • jtag：JTAG接口的实现。
  • rocket：core的流水线实现，L1指令和数据缓存，FPU，RoCC协处理器等。
  • scie：用于在core流水线里面添加自定义指令的接口。
  • subsystem：公共总线架构的实现，包含master和slave接口。
  • tile：可以包含core流水线，FPU，L1缓存，RoCC协处理器等的容器。用来生成多核系统。
  • tilelink：共享内存总线协议的实现。
  • util：包含ECC，arbiter， mux，随机数生成器等。

Rocket Chip依赖的其他库有：

  • chisel3 (https://github.com/ucb-bar/chisel3): 硬件生成语言
  • firrtl (https://github.com/ucb-bar/firrtl): RTL的中间语言表示，进而生成Verilog代码，C代码等最终代码。
  • hardfloat (https://github.com/ucb-bar/berkeley-hardfloat): Hardfloat holds Chisel code that generates parameterized IEEE 754-2008兼容的浮点数的Chisel实现，包含乘加，和整数类型以及不同精度之间的转换。
  • rocket-tools (https://github.com/freechipsproject/rocket-tools): RISC-V的toolchain。已经upstream到了gcc，也可以直接通过官方的gcc获得。
  • torture (https://github.com/ucb-bar/riscv-torture): 用于压力测试的随机指令生成器。
entry.summary: Rocket Chip是基于Chisel开发的一款开源SoC生成器（Generator，生成器的概念请参考本站对于Chisel的介绍），它包含了由core，cache以及互连（interconnect）等构成的模块库，以此为基础构成一个完整的SoC，并可以生成可综合的RTL
